info.name: Easier GMail
info.description:
Cleaner UI for Google Mail. Hides or moves unnecessary stuff, improves the visibility of important things, makes it easier to perform common actions on the emails.

P.S. It works for me, but it doesn't mean it will work for you too.
info.additionalInfo:
Main changes:
- more contrast overall
- less noise
- more explicit buttons
- visual separation of titles in message chains
- expanded citing in messages
- moved search bar to bottom
- smaller and more humble create message button
